mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM car_information WHERE is_deleted = false

SELECT ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type FROM car_information ci LEFT JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE ci.is_deleted = false AND info.is_deleted = false ORDER BY ci.car_info_id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT ci.car_info_id, -- (추가) info.model_name, -- modelName info.car_num AS carNum, -- carNum info.manufacture_year, -- manufactureYear info.mileage, -- mileage info.fuel_type, -- fuelType info.engine_capacity AS engineCapacity, -- engineCapacity info.transmission, -- transmission info.color, -- color info.car_price, -- carPrice info.previous_registration_fee AS previousRegistrationFee, -- previousRegistrationFee info.maintenance_cost AS maintenanceCost, -- maintenanceCost info.agency_fee AS agencyFee, -- agencyFee info.car_amount_price AS carAmountPrice, -- carAmountPrice ci.description, -- description ci.offer_report_number, -- offerReportNumber ci.vin_number, -- vinNumber info.car_location AS carLocation -- carLocation
FROM car_information ci JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE ci.car_info_id = #{carInfoId}

SELECT ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, ci.description, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type, info.color, info.previous_registration_fee AS previousRegistrationFee, info.maintenance_cost AS maintenanceCost, info.agency_fee AS agencyFee, info.car_location AS carLocation, info.owner_change_count AS ownerChangeCount, info.car_price AS carPrice, info.car_num AS carNum, info.car_amount_price AS carAmountPrice FROM car_information ci LEFT JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE ci.is_deleted = false AND info.is_deleted = false AND info.model_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')

SELECT ci.car_info_id, info.model_name, info.manufacture_year, info.mileage, info.transmission, info.car_price, info.fuel_type FROM car_information ci LEFT JOIN information info ON ci.car_info_id = info.car_info_id WHERE ci.is_deleted = false AND info.is_deleted = false AND ci.cate_code = #{cateCode} ORDER BY ci.car_info_id DESC LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
